text:
Marco Reus (born 31 May 1989) is a German association football player who plays for
Borussia Dortmund and the Germany national football team. Reus is known for his speed and his ability to adapt easily to a new position. He was included in Germany's 2014 FIFA World Cup squad, however he was injured in a game before the World Cup, so he could not play.
International.
He became the first Germany player to score a for his country at Russia 2018 after the footballing nation's poor start to the tournament.
